name: Potato-Arugula Salad With Cucumber Vinaigrette
keywords: arugula, cucumber juice, red potato, summer
recipeIngredient: 6 medium red potatoes (1 1/2 pounds), cut into 1-inch dice
1/2 cup cucumber vinaigrette with basil and garlic (see recipe)
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes in a saucepan, cover with water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes. Drain and let cool. Place in a large bowl and toss well with the arugula. Mix in the vinaigrette and season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve cold or at room temperature.
